verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD אַשְׁרֵי־ <S%H835><s%> Blessed אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [is] the man יָרֵ֣א <S%H3372><s%> [that] feareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּ֝מִצְוֹתָ֗יו <S%H4687><s%> in his commandments חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> [that] delighteth מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> shall be mighty בָּ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon earth יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> His seed דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> the generation יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> shall be blessed

הוֹן־ <S%H1952><s%> Wealth וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> and riches בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> [shall be] in his house וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever

זָ֘רַ֤ח <S%H2224><s%> there ariseth בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in the darkness א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> light לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <S%H3477><s%> Unto the upright חַנּ֖וּן <S%H2587><s%> [he is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> and full of compassion וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> and righteous

טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> A good אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חוֹנֵ֣ן <S%H2603><s%> sheweth favour וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <S%H3867><s%> and lendeth יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <S%H3557><s%> he will guide דְּבָרָ֣יו <S%H1697><s%> his affairs בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> with discretion

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> Surely he shall not be moved לְזֵ֥כֶר <S%H2143><s%> remembrance ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be in everlasting יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous

מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <S%H8052><s%> tidings רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> of evil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> He shall not be afraid נָכ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is fixed לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart בָּטֻ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> trusting בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD

סָמ֣וּךְ <S%H5564><s%> [is] established לִ֭בּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> His heart לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> he shall not be afraid עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> Until אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> until he see בְצָרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> [his desire] upon his enemies

פִּזַּ֤ר ׀ <S%H6340><s%> He hath dispersed נָ֘תַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> he hath given לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <S%H34><s%> to the poor צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness עֹמֶ֣דֶת <S%H5975><s%> endureth לָעַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <S%H7161><s%> his horn תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> shall be exalted בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> with honour

רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> shall see וְכָעָ֗ס <S%H3707><s%> [it] and be grieved שִׁנָּ֣יו <S%H8127><s%> with his teeth יַחֲרֹ֣ק <S%H2786><s%> he shall gnash וְנָמָ֑ס <S%H4549><s%> and melt away תַּאֲוַ֖ת <S%H8378><s%> the desire רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> shall perish
